name: Nest
description: Nest is a minimalist portfolio tracker built to help long-term investors visualize their wealth growth over time. It combines elegant charts, personalized projections, and an intuitive interface to help users build investment habits with intention and clarity.

name: Duordle
description: Duordle is an online game inspired by Wordle, offering a cooperative word-guessing experience. Built with React, Node.js, and TypeScript, it uses Socket.io for real-time gameplay and Tailwind CSS for responsive design.

name: GPTerminal
description: A CLI application for interactive conversations with GPT models. Supports Linux and MacOS terminals.

name: Web Voyager
description: A comprehensive travel platform built with ASP.NET Core MVC. Includes secure user authentication with Microsoft's Identity Technology and offers booking for flights, hotels, and car rentals.

name: Sorting Algorithm Visualizer
description: A web application to visualize sorting algorithms like Bubble Sort, Quick Sort, and more. Interactive and educational.

name: Connect Four with Minimax
description: A Java implementation of Connect Four featuring AI built with the Minimax algorithm and alpha-beta pruning.

name: Portfolio Website
description: This is my portfolio website built using Typescript, React (Vite), styled with Tailwind CSS, and hosted with Render. The site is designed to showcase my projects, skills, and experiences.

name: Miscellaneous Projects
description: Repository for my miscellaneous code, pet projects, or just code that doesn't fit into specific categories or projects.
